an5.126:4.3: Asappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṃ na jānāti, apariṇatabhojī ca hoti, dussīlo ca, pāpamitto ca.
an5.126:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā anāyussā.
an5.126:5.3: Sappāyakārī hoti, sappāye mattaṃ jānāti, pariṇatabhojī ca hoti, sīlavā ca, kalyāṇamitto ca.
an5.126:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca dhammā āyussā”ti.
